body: Good to see i'm learning some of the right champions

replies.body:
Not really, pick rate doesn't mean they are strong.

Top picks has several ADC's because there are 18 to pick from (not included is teemo) and of those 18, very few are played by anyone but mains of the champ (think Urgot and Quinn) meaning a high play rate means a lot less.

The realistic ADC list: {Tristana, Jinx, Vayne, Caitlyn, Graves, Lucian, Kalista}

From that list, 2 are in every game (yes i am selling other ADC's short, but this is reality).

Similar goes for supports.

Pick rate in solo Queue is also less about whether the champion is good, and more about if they can solo carry (that covers all of them top 5).

Competitive play is more what you want to look at in terms of either power, or team play mechanics, which are better to pick up in general, but are also harder to play.
